I think doing this first infusion is going to be a big learning experience. Next time we will all know what to expect and not worry so. Tylenol and benedryl really help. Â I do notice I am taking less now. It was around the clock meds those first days. I'm glad you got some relief. How is it going with your hair? You made me laugh with your hair washing comment. It is so true! My hair hasn't started falling out yet. My head has been feeling sore though. I think that happens before it starts.... Annie, its so hard to see those commercials. My heart just about breaks watching children having cancer. I don't think I will ever watch another movie about cancer. On a funny note I remember going to see " Terms of endearment" in 1983, I was 22 and with my husband and his mother. While in the theatre I was crying and wiping my face. When the movies was over I went to the ladies room and when I looked in the mirror, my face looked ten years older! I said omg! that movie aged me! I realized when we got home that I had been reading the news paper before we left and the print from the paper was on my hands, when I wiped my face from crying it dried on my face. lol Heather, I hope you enjoyed Christmas shopping! Well, going to eat breakfast. I hope everyone has a better day today. Hugs...Â
